_header: So long thou may on the stone spit

BodDou52.Transcription:
So long þou may spitt on þe stonþat hit wil be
                    wet
BodDou52.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Die Mittelenglische Sprichwörtersammlung in Douce 52.” 
             Festschrift zum XII Deutschen Neuphilolgentage in München
                1906.
            E. Stollreither, ed. 
         Erlangen (1906): 40-64: 56.

RylandsLat394.Transcription:
So longe þu may on þe stone speteþat at þe laste
                    it woll be wete
RylandsLat394.Note:
Translating ‘Irriguum vere lapidem tibi sputa
                    dedere’, which follows.
RylandsLat394.Editions:
Pantin,  William A. 
             “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands
                Latin MS. 394.” 
             Bulletin of the John Rylands Library
         14 (1930): 81-114: 107.
